markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swift Leap](/Feats.aspx?ID=3506) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 49</row>

**Archetype** [Ghoul](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=178)

**Prerequisites**
[Ghoul Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3504)

</column>

---

Your undead physiology allows you to leap quickly toward or away from your opponent. You [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=81). This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

 If you are satiated, you can choose to end your satiation to instead [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=36) or [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=37) without triggering reactions, as you take a quick, enormous jump before any foe can react to your movement.
name: Swift Leap

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 4" pfs="Standard" > Swift Leap Single Action Source Book of the Dead pg. 49 Archetype Ghoul Prerequisites Ghoul Dedication --- Your undead physiology allows you to leap quickly toward or away from your opponent. You Leap. This movement doesn't trigger reactions. If you are satiated, you can choose to end your satiation to instead High Jump or Long Jump without triggering reactions, as you take a quick, enormous jump before any foe can react to your movement.
